text: Giulio Questi (18 March 1924 - 3 December 2014) was an Italian movie director and screenwriter.Marco Giusti, Dizionario dei film italiani stracult, Roma, Frassinelli, 2004. He was known for his roles in La morte ha fatto l'uovo and Django Kill! (If You Live Shoot!). Questi was born in Bergamo, Lombardy, Italy.
